title: Negative marking in pessat???
content:
Guys is there negative marking this year?????
This scared the shit of of me today morningðŸ—¿

comments.body:
Negative marking has been included from this year.
For every wrong answer they deduct 0.25  marks.
We were lucky not to have it
Idk if this is accurate but in some website it was mentioned that negative marking is only applicable for englishÂ
Yes, from this year negative marking, I made a post about it [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/PESU/s/3RVNcWW5o2) few days ago
